message: Nice plugin to include in News websites!
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Like it? Tweet it!
caption: pongsocket.com
description: “Like it? Tweet it!” is a jQuery-powered JavaScript widget that enables visitors to your website or blog to write a tweet about the site directly in a box displayed in the corner of the website, with a link to the site already embedded in the input field.
